title: KIM SWITCH / FIGHT FAILURE
description: Kim's reaction to You trying to punch Measurehead and failing at it.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not even sure the *one bullet*..."
dialogueTree.english: "I'm not even sure the *one bullet* my chamber holds would even prick that hulk."
dialogueTree.polish: „Mam wrażenie, że *jeden pocisk* znajdujący się w komorze mojej broni ledwo połaskotałby tego kolosa”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: «У мяне адчуванне, што *адзін патрон*, які знаходзіцца ў камеры маёй зброі, ледзь бы пацешыў гэтага волата».

links.title: You: ""But *he's* the one trying to provo..."
Kim Kitsuragi: ""And you're just going to *let* him..."
links.english: "And you're just going to *let* him manipulate you like that?" He raises an eyebrow.
links.polish: „I po prostu *pozwolisz* mu, by tak tobą manipulował?” – pyta, unosząc brew.
links.belarusian: «І ты проста *дазволіш* яму так табой маніпуляваць?» – пытаецца яна, уздымаючы брыво.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I was trying to assert my do..."
links.english: "Okay, I was trying to assert my dominance over him."
links.polish: „Dobrze, próbowałem po prostu okazać swoją dominację”.
links.belarusian: «Добра, я проста спрабаваў паказаць сваю дамінацыю».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not here on some political q..."
links.english: "We're not here on some political quest, we're here to solve a crime. Don't make this situation any more volatile than it already is."
links.polish: „Nie jesteśmy tu na jakiejś politycznej krucjacie – jesteśmy tu, aby wyjaśnić sprawę morderstwa. Nie zaogniaj jeszcze bardziej sytuacji”.
links.belarusian: «Мы тут не на нейкай палітычнай крыжовай паходзе — мы тут, каб растлумачыць пытанне забойства. Не абвастрывай сітуацыю яшчэ больш».

links.title: You: ""But... I was fighting *bad*, unsav..."
links.english: "But... I was fighting *bad*, unsavoury ideologies. I'm a hero."
links.polish: „Ale... walczyłem ze *złymi*, podłymi ideologiami. Jestem bohaterem”.
links.belarusian: «Але... я змагаўся са *злымі*, подлымі ідэалогіямі. Я герой».

links.title: You: ""How else are we gonna get through..."
links.english: "How else are we gonna get through the gates?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be some other way. Let'..."
links.english: "There must be some other way. Let's go see the yard again -- it faces the other end of the harbour. We're done with Measurehead here."
links.polish: „Musi być jakieś inne wejście. Rozejrzyjmy się jeszcze raz na podwórzu – widać stamtąd drugą stronę portu. Z Miarogłowym nic nie wskóramy”.
links.belarusian: «Павінна быць нейкі іншы ўваход. Давайце агледзімся яшчэ раз на двары — адтуль бачны другі бок порта. З Міароглавым нічога не дасягнем».

links.title: You: ""Can't promise that. I might attack..."
links.english: "Can't promise that. I might attack him again." [Leave.]
links.polish: „Nic nie obiecuję. Mogę go zaatakować znowu”. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: «Нічога не абяцаю. Магу атаківаць яго зноў». [Адыдзі].

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant groans, but doesn't..."
links.english: The lieutenant groans, but doesn't say anything.
links.polish: Porucznik wydaje z siebie jęk, ale nic nie mówi.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант выдае стогн, але нічога не кажа.

links.title: Volition: "That's right, you *should* do it ag..."
links.english: That's right, you *should* do it again! It's the *last* thing he'll be expecting.
links.polish: Właśnie. *Powinieneś* to zrobić znowu. To *ostatnie*, czego się będzie spodziewał.
links.belarusian: Вось. *Павінен* гэта зрабіць зноў. Гэта *апошняе*, чаго ён будзе чакаць.

links.title: You: ""Alright, fine. I won't do it again..."
links.english: "Alright, fine. I won't do it again." [Leave.]
links.polish: „Dobra, w porządku, więcej tego nie zrobię”. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: «Добра, усё ў парадку, больш гэтага не зраблю». [Адыдзі].

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "Let's think of something..."
links.english: He nods. "Let's think of something else."

links.title: Volition: "No, no. You *should* do it again. I..."
links.english: No, no. You *should* do it again. It's the *last* thing he'll be expecting.
links.polish: Nie, nie. *Powinieneś* to zrobić znowu. To *ostatnie*, czego się będzie spodziewał.
links.belarusian: Не, не. *Ты павінен* гэта зрабіць зноў. Гэта *апошняе*, чаго ён будзе чакаць.
